p.s: In my country were war and me and my family were right in the middle of it.
We hadn't much food or water.
So I decided to immigrate in New York.
I went there by boat and my family don't want to come with me.
I said: I will get you here as soon as possible.
I started a new life in New York and went working.
After two years of hard work I had the money to get my family here.
So in 2007 we were together again.
Now we are living in New York, we have no problems and lifelive a good life.
My sons aren't at home anymore Chiko lives in California he havehas two daughters and a wife.
Rahid my other son is a professional football player now.
It was the best decision ever to leave Iraq.
The two yeats without my family were hard and it was a long way to get on legal immigrant but now I'm living my dream life.
The only thing I want to do before I die is visiting my home country.
I just want a last ride to Iraq thatsthat's everything I'm dreaming of but I hope it's not that hard to get there like I've got here.
I don't want to sit on a boat for weeks or been scared of the terrorists.
I want a funny holiday with my family at beach.
